snippet.title: Nurture Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/244710/

Nurture is a small simplistic game where we invite you to return to the world of Shelter every day and take care of your young. In this intimate and slow paced experience you will feed your cubs and see them begin their lives.

Nurture is a free experience that is accessable to anyone that owns a copy of Shelter. Simply select "nurture" via "extra" in Shelters main menu.

Music by Retro Family
